# Restructure: Move foundry agents, instructions, prompts, skills to root level

This PR moves the `agents`, `instructions`, `prompts`, and `skills` folders from `src/foundry/` to the root level of the repository. This restructuring aims to simplify the project layout and make these components more accessible.

## Changes
- Moved `src/foundry/agents/` to `agents/`
- Moved `src/foundry/instructions/` to `instructions/`
- Moved `src/foundry/prompts/` to `prompts/`
- Moved `src/foundry/skills/` to `skills/`

All files have been renamed (moved) without content changes.
